Outline

Source: R/bt_functions.R
bt_outline.Rd

Outline

Usage

bt_outline(bertin, fill, opacity, stroke, strokeWidth, step, ...)

Arguments

bertin

map object

fill

fill

opacity

opacity

stroke

str

strokeWidth

str wid

step

step

...

other param

Value

a map object

Examples

bt_outline(fill = "#ADD8F7", stroke = "#4269ad") |>
  bt_draw()
